content: > inspired by a designer coat that was priced at over a thousand dollars this coat takes the granny square from mundane to stunning we used six shades of super saver in neutral shades but you should feel free to experiment with your favorite colors pattern is given to fit small to 3x sizes small/medium large/x-large 2x-large/3x-large finished bust 48 52 56 /122 132 142 cm finished length 36 39 42 /91 5 99 106 5 cm red heart super saver 364 yards/333m 7 oz/198g 312 black a - 4 5 5 skeins 313 aran b - 2 2 2 skeins 334 buff c - 1 1 2 skein s 336 warm brown d - 1 1 2 skein s 360 café latte e - 1 2 2 skein s 378 claret f - 1 2 2 skein s crochet hooks 5 5mm/us i-9 6mm/usj-1 and 6 5mm/us k-10½ gauge one granny square measures about 6 x 6 /15 x 15 cm using smallest hook for size small/medium about 6½ x 6½ 16 5 x 16 5cm using middle-sized hook for size large/x-large about 7 x 7 18 x 18 cm using largest hook for size 2x-large/3x- large
